metaTags.title: Ferme Noël d'Antan | Reservation
metaTags.description: Reserve your magical moment at Ferme Noël d'Antan now to pick your Christmas tree! Experience a unique family experience in our beautiful Christmas tree forest.
metaTags.og:title: Reservation for self-picking Christmas trees

title: Reservation for self-picking
information: It is important to reserve the date and time for your self-picking. 10 parking spaces are available for each 30-minute slot. For more information, please read our <faqLink>FAQ</faqLink> or contact us at <phoneLink href="tel:$t(common:contact.phone.compact)">$t(common:contact.phone.formatted)</phoneLink>.
imageAlt: A family in a sled pulled by a large reindeer

rulesAlert.title: No animals & cash only
rulesAlert.content: For safety reasons, animals are not allowed on the site. In addition, we only accept cash, so make sure you have enough with you.

rules.label: Rules
rules.noAnimals: I will not bring any animals with me

errors.reservationNotFound: This time slot is not found...
errors.reservationIsFull: Sorry, this time slot is full...

tempDisabled.title: Reservation temporarily disabled...
tempDisabled.description: The site is under development, the reservation system will be ready in a few weeks! We thank you for your patience :)

whereSection.title: Where are we?
whereSection.description: We are located at <addressLink>2423, 7th rang, Saint-Théodore-d'Acton</addressLink>. Use this interactive map to get to our farm!

cookieDisabled.title: Reservations disabled until policies are accepted...
cookieDisabled.description: For more information, please read our <policyLink>Privacy Policy</policyLink>.
